```py
$ docker run -d \
	--name my_postgres \
	-e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=mysecretpassword \
	-v pg_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data \
	-p 5432:5432 \
	postgres
```

```py
 id | name |  	email  	 
----+------+------------------
  1 | Abby | abby@example.com
  2 | Bob  | bob@example.com
```

```py
$ docker stop my_postgres
$ docker rm my_postgres
```

```py
$ docker run -d \
	--name my_postgres \
	-e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=mysecretpassword \
	-v pgdata:/var/lib/postgresql/data \
	-p 5432:5432 \
	postgres
```

```py
 id | name |  	email  	 
----+------+------------------

  2 | Bob  | bob@example.com
```
